name: LifeSaver Int'l Inc.
overview:
LifeSaver Int’l, Inc. is a manufacturer of saliva-based testing products known as Stiks®.

This revolutionary design is based around public safety, is non-invasive but self-engaging and cost effective which yields results within two minutes of use, eliminating the need for needles, laboratories and technicians.

LifeSaver Stiks® utilize small samples of saliva which are used to detect infectious diseases (HIV and Hepatitis), health conditions (Diabetes and Pregnancy) and substance abuse (Alcohol and Drugs of Abuse).

LifeSaver delivers the power to detect, combat and prevent disease while improving health conditions worldwide.
